comet.agent.core.nlg.nlg module¶

NLG is the abstract parent class for all nlg classes and defines the interface that should be followed.

comet.agent.core.nlg.slotfilling_nlg module¶

SlotFillingNLG is a simple template-based nlg, designed to work for Slot-Filling applications. The purpose of this class is to provide a quick way of running Conversational Agents, sanity checks, and to aid debugging.

class comet.agent.core.nlg.slotfilling_nlg.SlotFillingNLG(args=None)[source]¶

Bases: comet.agent.core.nlg.nlg.NLG

If the value is a list convert to string to show

Parameters

Returns:

static format_intent_slot(intent, attrs)[source]¶

Convert intent and slot to template format. :type intent: str :param intent: the intent og dialogue act. Example: Inform :type attrs: str :param attrs: The attributes of dialogue act. Example: color;image;

Returns: The template format. Example: “inform {color}, {image}”

generate_output(_dialogue_acts, state=None)[source]¶

NLG for Babe domain

Parameters

  • _dialogue_acts (List[DialogueAct]) – List of dialogue act

  • state (Optional[DialogueState]) – current state results

Returns: Metadata output including:
{

“text”: utter, “quick_replies”: [], “buttons”: [], “elements”: [], “attachment”: [], “custom”: [], “timestamp”: time.time(),

}

Return type

Union[Dict, str]
